thread.title: Mr Charles Detheridge
thread.title_full: Outdoor and Country (www.outdoorandcountry.co.uk) reviewed by Mr Charles Detheridge

author: Mr Charles Detheridge
title: Mr Charles Detheridge
text: I needed a new hat and the Barbour ones are favourite. I found one at a good price it arrived in a couple of days, well boxed and correct size. Impressed with the service. Highly recommended.
